title: Entropy bounds for massive scalar field in positive curvature space
abstract: We consider a massive scalar field with arbitrary coupling in $\mathbf{S}^{1}\times \mathbf{S}^{3}$ space, which mimics the thermal expanding universe, and calculate explicitly all relevant thermodynamical functions in the low- and high-temperature regimes, extending previous analysis of entropy bounds and entropy/energy ratios performed in the conformal case. For high temperatures, new mass-dependent entropy ratios are established which, differently to the conformal limit, fulfil Bekenstein's and Verlinde's bounds in the physical region.
